section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There's a discrepancy in the capital contributions. For JVLS, LLC, the description includes '$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Addition to The Total Contributions,' but there is also an 'Agreed Value' of '$3,500,000.00 USD.' This is a contradiction, as the description implies ongoing contributions, while the agreed value suggests a fixed amount.

section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The agreement states that the business name will be BM&V2GO; however, this might violate the law, as the full legal name of each entity should be on display within business documents. Therefore, this could be seen as an omission.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers. This means the purpose of the joint venture is unknown and will be decided in the future. This is a structural flaw because the purpose of a joint venture should be decided before signing the agreement.
